page.title: 14EDUCATION
page.content: A variety of{education}is provided in this area.This ranges from nursery education, e.g The Rainbow Centre, through{primary}education (seven primary schools) to{secondary}school (two secondary schools).For{further {education}people must travel to Greenock (James Watt College) or further afield to colleges and universities in Paisley or Glasgow. Primary and secondary education is divided into two major sectors.These are the Catholic sector and the non-denominational sector. Children attend primary school from about five to twelve and go on to secondary school from twelve to sixteen years though they may stay on longer. Primary schools take in children from a smaller, local area whereas secondary take in a wider area.
